verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesu raajun nee yadalo vasiyimpa neeyavaa ? Needu bhaaramunu mosen nedankeekarimpavaa ?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Inka thaama sinchinacho venuka Mosa magunu ipude rakshana dinamu , venuka rakshanabbadu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pilchi nilchu rakshakuniki thalupunu theeyumu needu jeeva balamula nede samarpimpumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Repu yani thaamasimpa nashtamu kalgu sadaa manchi samayamu vrudhaa yagun kastapadedavu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yohaanu moodu padahaarunu vishwasimpumu dappi gonna vaarin pilchun rooka kaasulu lekaye{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Halleluya paadutakai vallabhuni yoddaku raa throsiveya dennadunu Manchi Yesu naadhudu{/lang-eng}
